title: How to Use Baobab Powder

steps.headline: Mix baobab powder with water or juice.
steps.description: Baobab by itself tastes like diluted lemonade. It is very refreshing after a hard workout.

steps.headline: Add the baobab powder to yogurt or smoothies for an antioxidant rich treat.
Stir a spoonful into breakfast cereal or oatmeal.
Mix baobab powder into the batter for pancakes, waffles or other baked goods.
Eat baobab sherbet or ice cream.
Add baobab powder to tea, marinades or sauces.
Enjoy baobab powder in a mango smoothie.
steps.description:
Mix the following ingredients:
2 heaped tablespoon baobab powder
1 x banana (peeled and sliced)
2 cups mango juice
1 cup natural yogurt.

steps.headline: Enjoy a tropical smoothie made with baobab powder.
steps.description:
Mix the following ingredients:
2 tablespoons of baobab powder
2 cups of tropical fruit juice
1 cup diced of any tropical fruit, for example, banana, pawpaw, mango, pineapple
1/2 cup plain yogurt.

steps.headline: Enjoy baobab powder in a honey milkshake.
steps.description:
Mix the following ingredients:
½ cup milk
2 tablespoons baobab fruit powder
3 scoops plain ice-cream
3 tablespoons plain yogurt
2 tablespoons honey
Honey to garnish.

text:
Basic Uses For The Powder Mix baobab powder with water or juice. Baobab by itself tastes like diluted lemonade. It is very refreshing after a hard workout. Add the baobab powder to yogurt or smoothies for an antioxidant rich treat.  Stir a spoonful into breakfast cereal or oatmeal.  Mix baobab powder into the batter for pancakes, waffles or other baked goods.  Eat baobab sherbet or ice cream. It's delicious and nutritious. Add baobab powder to tea, marinades or sauces.  Examples of Recipes Enjoy baobab powder in a mango smoothie. Mix the following ingredients:
2 heaped tablespoon baobab powder
1 x banana (peeled and sliced)
2 cups mango juice
1 cup natural yogurt. Enjoy a tropical smoothie made with baobab powder. Mix the following ingredients:
2 tablespoons of baobab powder
2 cups of tropical fruit juice
1 cup diced of any tropical fruit, for example, banana, pawpaw, mango, pineapple
1/2 cup plain yogurt. Enjoy baobab powder in a honey milkshake. Mix the following ingredients:
½ cup milk
2 tablespoons baobab fruit powder
3 scoops plain ice-cream
3 tablespoons plain yogurt
2 tablespoons honey
Honey to garnish.
